title: Eating an Actor’s Book - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Books   Celebrities   Cheats   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Showbiz   Special Abilities
author: 맛김
description:
The manager asked me.

“Jae hee, why do you always keep two copies of the script?”

I did not mind.

“Well, you can lose it.”

“Alas, a thorough child preparedness anyway. ”

However, it is a lie.

There is a reason why I can not get two copies of the script.

One is the purpose of carrying it on the film, showing it to others.

Another one is.

[Drama can be absorbed.]
[Do you want to absorb?]
I use it for food.

I take the script and make it mine only.

It is a bonus to ‘digest’ all the characters, dialogues, and writers’ images written in the script together.>
